data.convo: Watsup , ladies ! Y'll looking ’ fine tonight . May I have this dance ? He's cute ! He looks like Tiger Woods ! But , I can't dance ... It's all good . I'll show you all the right moves . My name's Malik . Nice to meet you . I'm Wen , and this is Nikki . How you feeling ’ , vista ? Mind if I take your friend ' round the dance floor ? She doesn't mind if you don't mind getting your feet stepped on . Right . Cool ! Let's go !
